Producer: Christopher Woodrow, Molly Conners, Lisa Muskat, David Gordon Green, Derrick Tseng
Production Co: Muskat Filmed Properties, September Film Distribution
Rating: PG-13 (Some Sexual Content|Language|Accident and Surgery Images)
Synopsis: In small-town Texas, a reclusive and bitter locksmith (Al Pacino) spends his days pining for the woman he lost because of the bad choices he made.
Title: Manglehorn
